      • hideFrom

        public void hideFrom(Player player)
        Description copied from interface: Bossbar
        Hides/removes the bossbar instance from the given Player. If the bossbar was not visible to the player typically nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to hide the bossbar from.
